System PLL Frequency Calculator

---------------------------------------------------
Highlightï¼š
 * An intuitive way to configure audio peripherals to get the corresponding PLL configuration.
 * Easy to get a configuration that allows multiple audio peripherals to use the PLL simultaneously.
 * Accurate error message if the user enters invalid parameters.

Change Log:
syspll-freq-calc-v0p1.xlsx (2024-06-14)
 * Initial release of syspll-freq-calc.
